attributes.action: Allow Sandhill Multi Academy Trust to choose which Academy Trust will take over
attributes.additional_details: Sandhill Multi Academy Trust consists of 2 primary academies, both in the Rawmarsh area of Rotherham.  The Trust have been informed by the Regional Schools Commissioner that we are to be re-brokered; that is, taken over by a new academy trust.  We accept that the re-brokering is inevitable and the Trust have indicated to the RSC that they are willing to cooperate during the re-brokering process. Our community would like the MAT to have the opportunity to choose which academy trust takes over.
attributes.background: Our community would ask that the Trust are able to choose which Trust takes over take over the running of both schools, to ensure that we are taken over by a Trust that shares our values & puts children at the heart of everything they do, to ensure that every child is the best that they can be.
